title: Epic 6: Multi-Index Management
description:
First-class support for organizing documents into collections.

- Named indices with isolated storage
- Per-index configuration (embedding model, chunk size)
- Cross-index search
- Index metadata and statistics

title: Epic 2: Text Document Ingestion
description:
Direct ingestion of text-based formats without OCR.

- Plain text files (.txt)
- Markdown (.md)
- LaTeX (.tex)
- DOCX (via python-docx or similar)
- Configurable page/section boundary detection
- String ingestion: ingest raw text/markdown/HTML from clipboard, web pages, or chat context (no file required)

title: Add status/health tool to MCP server
description:
local-rag exposes a status tool (document count, chunk count, memory usage, search mode). Quarry should expose similar diagnostics.

- Total documents and chunks
- Database path and size on disk
- Embedding model name and dimension
- Uptime or version

title: Epic 3: Image Format Support
description:
OCR for standalone image files (not wrapped in PDF).

- Common formats: PNG, JPG, TIFF, BMP, WebP
- Single-image and batch ingestion
- Image preprocessing for OCR quality (deskew, contrast)

title: Expose delete_document via MCP and CLI
description:
The database layer has delete_document() but it is not exposed through the MCP server or CLI. local-rag exposes delete_file â€” quarry should too.

- Add delete_document tool to MCP server
- Add 'quarry delete <document_name>' CLI command
- Confirm deletion returns feedback (e.g. chunk count removed)

title: Epic 5: Ingestion Quality
description:
Post-processing to improve extracted text quality.

- LLM-based OCR error correction
- Chunk quality scoring and filtering
- Duplicate and near-duplicate detection
- Table and figure extraction

title: Epic 4: Audio Transcription
description:
Speech-to-text ingestion for audio content.

- Audio format support: MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC
- AWS Transcribe or Whisper integration
- Speaker diarization
- Timestamped chunks for source reference
